Bio

Hello! I am Pengen Gao, currently working towards the M.Eng degree supersived by Prof. Wei Wang in Electronic Information College, Huazhong University of Science and Technology. I am expected to graduate in 2023. I got my B.Eng degree from Huazhong University of Science and Technology in 2020.

I am now collabrating with Prof. Chris Xiaoxuan Lu.
